short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access CRM Contacts and Deals directly from Gmail. Add or update your Contacts and Activities without leaving your Inbox.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension brings Onpipeline CRM into your Gmail inbox. 

You'll be able to access your contacts and deals without having to leave Gmail. When you click on any email message, you'll see the contacts and your sales history.

Each day you will obtain a clear overview of what you need to do. Your scheduled activities will be summarized. 

If you haven’t subscribed, you can start your free 30-day trial and get full access – no credit card. 

If you have any questions contact us at:
support@onpipeline.com
